name: SpeedBall Remastered
description:
SpeedBall Remastered

A Simple Tactics based Ball Parkour Game with Respawn and Star Looting Mechanisms with different and mind blowing parkour experiences in every Level. Also, The difficulty Increases with Increasing number of Levels.

Gain as many stars as you can without respawning even a single time.

It's gonna be hard for sure but if you can please drop a comment and let me know how many stars can you get?

My personal Score was 47 Stars. Let's see if anyone can beat that or not?

Be sure to let me know what you think in the comments!  Let me know if you liked or didn't like the game, and what it was.  Also let me know if you encountered any bugs!
